name: Ideate Explorer
tooltip: Find anything quickly with this tool, check for correct workset assignment, and more!

name: eTransmit
tooltip: Prepare models to be archived or transmitted to outside team members

name: TransferSingle
tooltip: Use this tool to Transfer Project Standards on a single item instead of an entire category

name: Scope Box Synchronizer
tooltip: Keep scope boxes in linked models synchronized with those in the host model

name: RTV Xporter Pro
tooltip: A powerful tool for batch exporting, printing and revision control

name: CTC BIM Manager Suite
tooltip: A collection of powerful tools for BIM Managers and Coordinators

name: CTC BIM Batch Suite
tooltip: A collection of powerful batching tools for exporting, family loading, upgrading and plotting

name: autoLink
tooltip: Extend Revit updating behavior to view references in schedules, tags and text so these stay in sync when changes occur

name: Dynamo
tooltip: A powerful visual scripting tool for computational design and daily task automation

name: BCF Manager
tooltip: Communicate issues with all team members such as collisions between trades via the open-source BCF schema

name: Clarity
tooltip: For HOK projects hosted on rs.hok.com that require external collaboration

name: Collaboration for Revit
tooltip: Now called "BIM 360 Design". Set up a project to be workshared with team members outside of HOK (subscription required - project expense)

name: V-Ray for Revit
tooltip: Render using V-Ray for Revit and take advantage of the Swarm efficiency (distributed rendering)

name: Isolate Warnings
tooltip: Maintain and audit your model by creating 3D views that isolate elements with associated warnings

name: COINS Auto-Section Box
tooltip: Create a 3D view with a section box around selected elements (note that a similar tool is now available ootb)

name: Revizto
tooltip: Export your models for cloud-based collaboration: markups, issue tracking, visualization and more

name: Color Splasher
tooltip: Filter, select & color elements based on parameter values to visualise and audit model data

name: Insight
tooltip: Energy performance analysis via Autodesk Cloud Services (use your HOK Autodesk Account)

name: COBie Extension
tooltip: Capture COBie data and export to a COBie compliant spreadsheet

name: Align
tooltip: Align, distribute or organize selected tags and text along the specified axis

name: Model Review
tooltip: Validate the accuracy and consistency of your projects by running various checks

name: BIM 360 Glue
tooltip: Clash detection in the cloud (subscription required - project expense or contractor provided)

name: Site Designer
tooltip: Site planning tools to shape the terrain for building sites within Revit

name: pyRevit
tooltip: A set of valuable open-source tools written in Python (currently distributing only Make Pattern for fill/hatch patterns)

name: Structural Cope Tool
tooltip: Automatically cope selected beams/columns with any number of intersecting members

name: Web Stiffener
tooltip: Quickly add web stiffeners on one or more W-beams

name: Column Splitter
tooltip: Split columns by point (now available ootb), by levels or by reference planes

name: Steel Connections
tooltip: View detailed structural connector geometry and modify additional parameters

name: Export to ETABS
tooltip: Export a structural Revit model to Etabs for analysis and member sizing

name: Fabrication Extension
tooltip: Export a fabrication layout from Revit to a fabrication job (MEP)

name: FormIt 360 Converter
tooltip: Convert FormIt files to the Revit file format

name: Revit DB Link
tooltip: Export Revit project data to a database, make changes and re-import

name: Lumion Exporter
tooltip: Export to Lumion

name: NBS Plugin
tooltip: Coordinate element data with the NBS Specification & access the National BIM Library

name: Trimble Connect Uploader
tooltip: Export to Trimble Connect to visualize the model in a browser, markup, and create To Dos
